version_description: We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.
We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.

What’s New:

- Use Apple Music, along with Spotify, to share songs and playlists
- Send videos to show you care
- Express yourself with even more stickers
- Respond to your partner’s comments

We hope you enjoy these new features! Remember to ask your partner to update their app, or they won’t be able to experience these new additions.

What’s New:

- Complete new Tuned challenges with your partner
- Create a beautiful reel of highlights just for you or to share with others
- More fun stickers
- Performance improvements to make your experience better

Can’t wait to hear what you think about these new features! Remember to ask your partner to update their app, or they won’t be able to experience these new additions.

What’s New:
- Custom Moods! Add your own mood and connect it to any color.
- Passcode & Face ID app unlock to keep Tuned extra private.
- Performance improvements to make your experience better.

Can’t wait to hear what you think about these new features!

What’s New:
- Custom Moods! Add your own mood and connect it to any color.
- Passcode & Face ID app unlock to keep Tuned extra private.
- Performance improvements to make your experience better.

- Celebrate Pride month with special stickers, cards, backgrounds and more!
- Challenges: camera shy? Now you can respond with text!
- Add GIFs and stickers to your comments.
- Made a mistake? No worries - now you can edit posts and comments.
- Keep Tuned extra private with FaceID/TouchID/passcode app unlock.

- Enjoy more expressive sharing with your Memoji.
- Hyperlink support when you share a link in a Note or Comment
- Performance improvements to make your experience better

What’s New:
- Celebrate past relationship milestones and remember important future moments by adding dates of anniversaries, birthdays, trips and more.
- Upload multiple photos at once.
- Easily find memories with improved timeline filtering.
- Control which notifications you receive, including the highly requested partner mood updates!

Bug Fix:
- You can now directly respond to text challenges from notifications.

We hope these improvements help you & your partner get the most out of Tuned!

What’s New:
- Celebrate past relationship milestones and remember important future moments by adding dates of anniversaries, birthdays, trips and more.
- Upload multiple photos at once.
- Easily find memories with improved timeline filtering.
- Control which notifications you receive, including the highly requested partner mood updates!

Bug Fix:
- You can now directly respond to text challenges from notifications.
- You can now delete past moments

We hope these improvements help you & your partner get the most out of Tuned!

We are always refining the Tuned experience. This update includes bug fixes and improvements.

Thank you for using Tuned, please continue to share your feedback!

What’s New:
- Improved organization of your Tuned space to easily navigate between your past, present and future together.
- Prompts to help guide you in connecting with your partner on Tuned.
- Create highlight reels to turn your memories into a beautiful, shareable memento.
- Collaborative lists to keep track of things that matter to you both.

We’ve listened to your feedback and worked hard to bring these improvements to life in Tuned V2. We look forward to hearing what you think!

Whats New:
- Now when you take a Challenge, you can now add a video or photo from camera roll as your response.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes to make your Tuned experience better!
Performance improvements and bug fixes to make your Tuned experience better!

- Social Challenges are here! Nominate another couple to take a couple’s challenge by sharing your completed challenge to messages or Instagram.
- Update your partner’s picture more easily from the Present tab.
- Share or save your photos, challenges and stickers from Tuned to your photo library or Instagram.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes to make your Tuned experience better!

* We’ve added direct messaging within Tuned! Now you can start a conversation around Mood changes or anything else that is top of mind.
* Report bugs and send us feedback by shaking your device.
Performance improvements and bug fixes to make your Tuned experience better!

What's New:
- Now you can attach photos or videos to past milestones so you can save & look back on your favorite memories from special dates in your relationship.
- We made it easier for you to select memories from your photo library and use the camera to capture a moment while you’re in the app.
- Performance improvements for a speedier direct messaging experience!

Happy holidays from all of us at Tuned!!

What's New:
- Now you can attach photos or videos to past milestones so you can save & look back on your favorite memories from special dates in your relationship.
- We made it easier for you to select memories from your photo library and use the camera to capture a moment while you’re in the app.
- Bug fixes to make your Tuned experience better.
- Performance improvements for a speedier direct messaging experience!

Happy holidays from all of us at Tuned!!

- Now you can contact support for help from settings!
- Bug fixes and performance improvements to make your Tuned experience better.

Happy holidays from all of us at Tuned!!
- Bug fixes, including addressing stickers and greeting cards not loading.
